com.comphenix.xp.mods

Interface BlockService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardBlockService

    public interface BlockService
extends Service
    A handler for inventory click events on custom or standard blocks.
    Author:
    Kristian

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BlockResponse processClickEvent(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event, ItemQuery block)
      Called when a player has interacted with an inventory.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.comphenix.xp.extra.Service

        getServiceName

    • Method Detail

      • processClickEvent

        BlockResponse processClickEvent(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event,
                              ItemQuery block)
        Called when a player has interacted with an inventory.

        The response is only considered a success if the result is non-null and successful.

        Parameters:
        event - - the inventory event.
        block - - the block the given player last right-clicked. Note that this may be any arbitrary block.
        Returns:
        The default or custom behavior to take.
